title: PharmaTechHub
text:
Welcome to [PharmaTechHub], a space dedicated to all things R programming! Whether you’re just starting your journey in R or you’re an experienced user looking for new insights, this website is designed to provide you with practical, easy-to-follow tutorials and real-world examples to help you improve your R skills.
Here, you'll find:

Step-by-step tutorials for beginners and advanced users alike, covering everything from data manipulation and visualization to machine learning and statistical analysis.
In-depth guides from base to advanced R programming along with some of the popular R packages like tidyverse, shiny, and more…. with hands-on examples that you can apply in your day to day life.
Tips and tricks to help you solve common problems, optimize your R code, and make the most out of R's powerful features.

Whether you’re using R for data analysis, automation, or building interactive dashboards, this blog is here to make your experience more efficient and enjoyable. I believe in learning by doing, so every post is filled with code examples and practical applications that you can test and implement on your own.
Feel free to explore, share your feedback, and suggest topics that you’d like to see covered in future posts. My goal is to build a community where R enthusiasts of all levels can learn, grow, and share their knowledge.
Let's code and explore the world of data together with R!

title: About Me
text:
Hi, I’m Arun Kumar Mahesh, a programmer with over 10+ years of experience in the pharma domain. I have a passion for solving complex problems through coding and data analysis, which has led me to explore the power of R programming. My goal is to share valuable insights and practical knowledge with others in this field and helping them to improve their skills and achieve their goals.
You can connect with me on [LinkedIn] and follow my contributions on [Stack Overflow ].
